C Interface

Copyright (C) 2005 IENT-RWTH Aachen

GENIAL proposes a C interface to various functions.

Why use the C Interface of the precompiled library?

  • You can link C functions, even if the library was compiled from a third with any compiler,

  • The quickest precompiled libraries are available at GENIAL Homepage.
